mapper.select:
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(inne.or_pk separator ',') AS or_pk, inne.or_order_number AS order_no, inne.or_serial_special_number, inne.ss_name AS ord_comp_nm, IF( inne.or_buyer_another_name IS NOT NULL AND inne.or_buyer_another_name != '', inne.or_buyer_another_name, inne.or_buyer_name ) AS ord_nm, inne.or_receiver_name AS rec_nm, REPLACE(inne.or_buyer_contract_number1,'-','') AS ord_tel, REPLACE(inne.or_buyer_contract_number1,'-','') AS ord_mob, REPLACE(inne.or_receiver_contract_number1,'-','') AS rec_mob, REPLACE(inne.or_receiver_contract_number2,'-','') AS rec_tel, inne.or_shipping_address AS rec_addr1, inne.or_shipping_address_detail AS rec_addr2, inne.or_shipping_address_number AS rec_zip, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(inne.or_delivery_message), '(*1*)', 1) AS deliv_msg, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT_WS( ' ',inne.totalQuantity, inne.op_name) ORDER BY inne.op_name separator ';;') AS goods_nm -- GROUP_CONCAT(inne.totalQuantity separator ',') AS qty
FROM ( SELECT od.or_pk, od.or_serial_special_number, ss.ss_name, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_buyer_another_name, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_buyer_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number2, od.or_shipping_address, od.or_shipping_address_detail, od.or_shipping_address_number, od.or_product_order_number, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, od.or_amount, od.or_product_price, od.or_total_price, od.or_discount_price, od.or_product_fk, od.or_order_number, GROUP_CONCAT(od.or_delivery_message,'(*1*)') AS or_delivery_message, pm.pm_pk, pro.product_pk, pro.cf_fk, CONCAT_WS( ' : ', pro.product_name, op.option_name) AS op_name, pro.product_flag, om.om_pk, om.om_store_option_name, CONCAT_WS('',' ',(od.or_amount * om.om_option_amount)) as totalQuantity, op.option_pk, SUM(od.or_total_price) AS or_total_prices, od.or_total_cost FROM orders od INNER JOIN store_section ss ON ss.ss_pk = od.ss_fk INNER JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk INNER JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name INNER JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk INNER JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk WHERE od.regi_no IS NULL AND od.or_serial_special_number = #{searchKeyword} AND od.or_cancled_flag = 0 AND od.or_excel_div_flag = 0 GROUP BY od.or_pk, od.or_serial_special_number, ss.ss_name, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_buyer_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number2, od.or_shipping_address, od.or_shipping_address_detail, od.or_shipping_address_number, od.or_product_order_number, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, od.or_amount, od.or_product_price, od.or_total_price, od.or_discount_price, od.or_product_fk, od.or_order_number, pm.pm_pk, om.om_pk, pro.product_pk, pro.cf_fk, pro.product_flag, om.om_store_option_name, om.om_option_amount, op.option_pk, od.or_total_cost, op_name ORDER BY od.or_pk DESC ) inne GROUP BY inne.or_serial_special_number, inne.or_order_number, inne.or_buyer_another_name, inne.ss_name, inne.or_buyer_name, inne.or_receiver_name, inne.or_buyer_contract_number1, inne.or_receiver_contract_number1, inne.or_receiver_contract_number2, inne.or_shipping_address, inne.or_shipping_address_detail, inne.or_shipping_address_number

SELECT COUNT(out_or.or_serial_special_number) FROM( SELECT output.or_serial_special_number, SUM(output.serial_count) AS total_count, output.total_flag, output.deposit_flag FROM ( SELECT od.or_serial_special_number, COUNT(od.or_serial_special_number) AS serial_count, SUM(od.or_inv_flag) AS total_flag, SUM(od.or_deposit_flag) AS deposit_flag, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT od.or_user_column4 separator ','), ',', 1) AS or_deliv_enters FROM orders od INNER JOIN store_section ss ON od.ss_fk = ss.ss_pk LEFT JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk LEFT JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name LEFT JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk LEFT JOIN options_costs_matching ocm ON ocm.option_fk = op.option_pk LEFT JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk
INNER JOIN early_deliv_area eda ON od.or_shipping_address_number = eda.eda_zip_code INNER JOIN early_deliv_type edt ON edt.edt_pk = eda.edt_fk
od.or_delivery_invoice_number IS NULL AND od.or_refunds = 0
AND edt.edt_pk = #{edtFk} AND od.or_rec_type = 0
AND od.or_sending_deadline >= #{dateStart} AND od.or_sending_deadline <= #{dateEnd}
AND od.ss_fk = #{ssPk}
AND od.or_regdate = #{insertingCount}
AND ( or_buyer_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR or_receiver_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
AND or_buyer_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_receiver_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_buyer_contract_number1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_receiver_contract_number1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_order_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_delivery_invoice_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_shipping_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_delivery_message LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_product_order_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( or_product LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR or_product_option LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
AND pro.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND op.option_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_special_region_flag = 1 AND or_special_region_check_flag = 1
AND or_special_region_flag = 1 AND or_special_region_check_flag = 0
AND od.or_cancled_flag = 0 AND od.or_excel_div_flag = 0 AND od.or_sending_deadline <= #{dateEnd}
GROUP BY od.or_serial_special_number
HAVING or_deliv_enters IS NOT NULL AND or_deliv_enters != '' AND od.or_serial_special_number NOT IN ( SELECT deliv_out.or_serial_special_number FROM (SELECT od.or_serial_special_number, COUNT(od.or_serial_special_number) AS serial_count, SUM(od.or_inv_flag) AS total_flag FROM orders od INNER JOIN early_deliv_area eda ON od.or_shipping_address_number = eda.eda_zip_code INNER JOIN early_deliv_type edt ON edt.edt_pk = eda.edt_fk INNER JOIN deliv_impos di ON di.eda_fk = eda.eda_pk WHERE
od.or_excel_div_flag = 0 AND od.regi_no IS NULL AND od.or_cancled_flag = 0 AND od.or_sending_deadline >= #{dateStart} AND od.or_sending_deadline <= #{dateEnd} AND CONCAT(od.or_shipping_address, ' ', od.or_shipping_address_detail) LIKE CONCAT('%',di.di_address,'%')
GROUP BY od.or_serial_special_number ) deliv_out WHERE deliv_out.serial_count = deliv_out.total_flag
)
) output
GROUP BY output.or_serial_special_number HAVING total_count = output.total_flag AND total_count = output.deposit_flag
) out_or

SELECT datas.* FROM ( SELECT od.or_serial_special_number, od.or_pk, od.ss_fk, ss.ss_name, od.or_product_option, od.or_product, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_buyer_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_receiver_contract_number1, od.or_delivery_invoice_number, od.or_shipping_address, od.or_shipping_address_detail, od.or_order_number, od.or_product_order_number, od.or_product_number, od.or_sending_deadline, od.or_settlement_day, SUM(od.or_inv_flag) AS or_inv_flag, SUM(od.or_total_price) AS or_total_price, SUM(od.or_total_cost) AS or_total_cost, pm.pm_pk, pro.product_pk, pro.product_name, om.om_pk, op.option_pk, op.option_name, op.option_cost_flag, SUM(od.or_amount * om.om_option_amount) AS cf_fk, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT od.or_user_column4 separator ','), ',', 1) AS or_deliv_enters
FROM orders od INNER JOIN store_section ss ON od.ss_fk = ss.ss_pk INNER JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk INNER JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name INNER JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk INNER JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk INNER JOIN excel_order_seq eo ON op.eo_fk = eo.eos_pk
WHERE
od.or_sending_deadline >= #{dateStart}
AND od.or_excel_div_flag = 0 AND od.or_cancled_flag = 0 AND od.or_refunds = 0 GROUP BY od.or_serial_special_number, od.or_pk, od.ss_fk, od.or_product_option, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_buyer_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_receiver_contract_number1, od.or_delivery_invoice_number, od.or_order_number, od.or_product_order_number, od.or_product_number, od.or_sending_deadline, od.or_settlement_day, pm.pm_pk, om.om_pk, pro.product_pk, pro.product_name, op.option_pk, op.option_cost_flag, op.option_name ) datas, ( SELECT output.or_serial_special_number FROM ( SELECT od.or_serial_special_number, COUNT(od.or_serial_special_number) AS serial_count, SUM(od.or_inv_flag) AS total_flag, SUM(od.or_deposit_flag) AS total_deposit, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT od.or_user_column4 separator ','), ',', 1) AS or_deliv_enters FROM orders od
INNER JOIN early_deliv_area eda ON od.or_shipping_address_number = eda.eda_zip_code INNER JOIN early_deliv_type edt ON edt.edt_pk = eda.edt_fk
od.or_delivery_invoice_number IS NULL AND od.or_refunds = 0
AND od.or_sending_deadline >= #{dateStart} AND od.or_sending_deadline <= #{dateEnd}
AND edt.edt_pk = #{edtFk} AND od.or_rec_type = 0
AND od.ss_fk = #{ssPk}
AND od.or_regdate = #{insertingCount}
AND ( or_buyer_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR or_receiver_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
AND or_buyer_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_receiver_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_buyer_contract_number1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_receiver_contract_number1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_order_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_delivery_invoice_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_shipping_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_delivery_message LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_product_order_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( or_product LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR or_product_option LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
AND pro.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND op.option_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_special_region_flag = 1 AND or_special_region_check_flag = 1
AND or_special_region_flag = 1 AND or_special_region_check_flag = 0
AND od.or_cancled_flag = 0 AND od.or_excel_div_flag = 0 AND od.or_sending_deadline <= #{dateEnd}
GROUP BY od.or_serial_special_number
HAVING or_deliv_enters IS NOT NULL AND or_deliv_enters != ''
ORDER BY od.or_serial_special_number ASC ) output WHERE output.serial_count = output.total_flag AND output.serial_count = output.total_deposit GROUP BY output.or_serial_special_number
HAVING output.or_serial_special_number NOT IN ( SELECT deliv_out.or_serial_special_number FROM (SELECT od.or_serial_special_number, COUNT(od.or_serial_special_number) AS serial_count, SUM(od.or_inv_flag) AS total_flag FROM orders od INNER JOIN early_deliv_area eda ON od.or_shipping_address_number = eda.eda_zip_code INNER JOIN early_deliv_type edt ON edt.edt_pk = eda.edt_fk INNER JOIN deliv_impos di ON di.eda_fk = eda.eda_pk WHERE
od.or_excel_div_flag = 0 AND od.regi_no IS NULL AND od.or_cancled_flag = 0 AND od.or_sending_deadline >= #{dateStart} AND od.or_sending_deadline <= #{dateEnd} AND CONCAT(od.or_shipping_address, ' ', od.or_shipping_address_detail) LIKE CONCAT('%',di.di_address,'%')
GROUP BY od.or_serial_special_number ) deliv_out WHERE deliv_out.serial_count = deliv_out.total_flag
)
LIMIT #{firstRecordIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage} ) SELECTER WHERE datas.or_serial_special_number = SELECTER.or_serial_special_number ORDER BY
datas.or_settlement_day asc
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET or_delivery_invoice_number = #{regiNo}, req_no = #{reqNo}, res_no = #{resNo}, regi_no = #{regiNo}, regi_po_nm = #{regiPoNm}, res_date = #{resDate}, price = #{price}, v_tel_no = #{vTelNo}, arr_cnpo_nm = #{arrCnpoNm}, deliv_po_nm = #{delivPoNm}, deliv_area_cd = #{delivAreaCd}, or_invoice_num_date = #{orInvoiceNumDate}, or_deliv_count = #{orDelivCount}, edt_fk = 1 WHERE or_pk = #{orPk}

UPDATE orders SET or_delivery_invoice_number = null, req_no = null, res_no = null, regi_no = null, regi_po_nm = null, res_date = null, price = null, v_tel_no = null, arr_cnpo_nm = null, deliv_po_nm = null, deliv_area_cd = null, or_invoice_num_date = null, or_delivery_company = null, or_deliv_count = null, edt_fk = 0 WHERE or_pk IN ( SELECT inne.or_pk FROM ( SELECT or_pk FROM orders WHERE or_serial_special_number = #{orSerialSpecialNumber} ) inne )
mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT req_no SEPARATOR ',') AS req_no, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT res_no SEPARATOR ',') AS res_no, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT regi_no SEPARATOR ',') AS regi_no, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT regi_po_nm SEPARATOR ',') AS regi_po_nm, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT res_date SEPARATOR ',') AS res_date, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT v_tel_no SEPARATOR ',') AS v_tel_no, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT arr_cnpo_nm SEPARATOR ',') AS arr_cnpo_nm, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT deliv_po_nm SEPARATOR ',') AS deliv_po_nm, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT deliv_area_cd SEPARATOR ',') AS deliv_area_cd FROM orders WHERE or_serial_special_number = #{orSerialSpecialNumber}

SELECT IF( INNE.product_name LIKE '%등뼈%', 0, INNE.eos_deliv_seq ) as eos_deliv_seq, INNE.or_pk, INNE.or_serial_special_number, INNE.ss_name, INNE.or_buyer_name, INNE.or_buyer_another_name, INNE.or_receiver_name, INNE.or_shipping_address_number, INNE.or_shipping_address, INNE.or_shipping_address_detail, INNE.or_receiver_contract_number1, INNE.or_receiver_contract_number2, INNE.or_rec_type, INNE.or_rec_memo, INNE.or_rec_storage_place, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT INNE.or_delivery_message separator ',') AS or_delivery_message, INNE.product_name, INNE.option_name, INNE.om_pk, INNE.option_pk, SUM(INNE.totalQuantity) AS another_option_qty FROM(
SELECT od.or_pk, od.or_serial_special_number, ss.ss_name, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_buyer_another_name, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_buyer_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number2, od.or_shipping_address, od.or_shipping_address_detail, od.or_shipping_address_number, od.or_product_order_number, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, od.or_amount, od.or_product_price, od.or_total_price, od.or_discount_price, od.or_product_fk, od.or_order_number, GROUP_CONCAT(od.or_delivery_message separator ',') AS or_delivery_message, od.or_rec_type, od.or_rec_memo, od.or_rec_storage_place, pm.pm_pk, pro.product_pk, pro.product_name, pro.cf_fk, pro.product_flag, om.om_pk, om.om_store_option_name, (od.or_amount * om.om_option_amount) as totalQuantity, op.option_pk, op.option_name, eos.eos_deliv_seq FROM orders od INNER JOIN store_section ss ON ss.ss_pk = od.ss_fk INNER JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk INNER JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name INNER JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk INNER JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk INNER JOIN excel_order_seq eos ON op.eo_fk = eos.eos_pk WHERE od.regi_no IS NULL AND od.or_excel_div_flag = 0 AND od.or_cancled_flag = 0 AND od.or_refunds = 0 AND od.or_serial_special_number = #{searchKeyword} GROUP BY od.or_pk, od.or_serial_special_number, ss.ss_name, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_buyer_another_name, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_buyer_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number2, od.or_shipping_address, od.or_shipping_address_detail, od.or_shipping_address_number, od.or_product_order_number, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, od.or_amount, od.or_product_price, od.or_total_price, od.or_discount_price, od.or_product_fk, od.or_order_number, od.or_rec_type, od.or_rec_memo, od.or_rec_storage_place, pm.pm_pk, om.om_pk, pro.product_pk, pro.cf_fk, pro.product_flag, om.om_store_option_name, om.om_option_amount, op.option_pk, op.option_name, eos.eos_deliv_seq ) INNE GROUP BY eos_deliv_seq, INNE.or_pk, INNE.or_serial_special_number, INNE.ss_name, INNE.or_buyer_name, INNE.or_buyer_another_name, INNE.or_receiver_name, INNE.or_shipping_address_number, INNE.or_shipping_address, INNE.or_shipping_address_detail, INNE.or_receiver_contract_number1, INNE.or_receiver_contract_number2, INNE.or_rec_type, INNE.or_rec_memo, INNE.or_rec_storage_place, INNE.product_name, INNE.option_pk, INNE.om_pk, INNE.option_name ORDER BY eos_deliv_seq ASC, INNE.product_name DESC, INNE.option_name DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE orders SET or_delivery_invoice_number = #{regiNo}, req_no = #{reqNo}, res_no = #{resNo}, regi_no = #{regiNo}, regi_po_nm = #{regiPoNm}, res_date = #{resDate}, price = #{price}, v_tel_no = #{vTelNo}, arr_cnpo_nm = #{arrCnpoNm}, deliv_po_nm = #{delivPoNm}, deliv_area_cd = #{delivAreaCd}, or_invoice_num_date = #{orInvoiceNumDate}, or_deliv_count = #{orDelivCount}, or_delivery_company = '우체국택배', edt_fk = 1 WHERE or_pk IN
#{item.anotherOptionPk}

UPDATE orders SET or_delivery_invoice_number = #{orDeliveryInvoiceNumber}, regi_no = #{orDeliveryInvoiceNumber}, or_delivery_company = #{orDeliveryCompany}, or_invoice_num_date = #{orInvoiceNumDate}, or_deliv_count = #{orDelivCount}, edt_fk = 0 WHERE or_pk IN
#{item.anotherOptionPk}
mapper.select:
SELECT IF( INNE.product_name LIKE '%등뼈%', -1, INNE.eos_deliv_seq ) as eos_deliv_seq, INNE.or_pk, INNE.or_serial_special_number, INNE.ss_name, INNE.or_buyer_name, INNE.or_buyer_another_name, INNE.or_receiver_name, INNE.or_shipping_address_number, INNE.or_shipping_address, INNE.or_shipping_address_detail, INNE.or_receiver_contract_number1, INNE.or_receiver_contract_number2, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT INNE.or_delivery_message separator ',') AS or_delivery_message, INNE.or_delivery_invoice_number, INNE.req_no, INNE.res_no, INNE.regi_no, INNE.regi_po_nm, INNE.res_date, INNE.price, INNE.v_tel_no, INNE.arr_cnpo_nm, INNE.deliv_po_nm, INNE.deliv_area_cd, INNE.product_name, INNE.option_name, INNE.option_pk, INNE.or_rec_type, INNE.or_rec_memo, INNE.or_rec_storage_place, SUM(INNE.totalQuantity) AS another_option_qty FROM(
SELECT od.or_pk, od.or_serial_special_number, ss.ss_name, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_buyer_another_name, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_buyer_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number2, od.or_shipping_address, od.or_shipping_address_detail, od.or_shipping_address_number, od.or_product_order_number, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, od.or_amount, od.or_product_price, od.or_total_price, od.or_discount_price, od.or_product_fk, od.or_order_number, od.or_request, GROUP_CONCAT(od.or_delivery_message separator ',') AS or_delivery_message, od.or_delivery_invoice_number, od.req_no, od.res_no, od.regi_no, od.regi_po_nm, od.res_date, od.price, od.v_tel_no, od.arr_cnpo_nm, od.deliv_po_nm, od.deliv_area_cd, od.or_rec_type, od.or_rec_memo, od.or_rec_storage_place, pm.pm_pk, pro.product_pk, pro.product_name, pro.cf_fk, pro.product_flag, om.om_pk, om.om_store_option_name, (od.or_amount * om.om_option_amount) as totalQuantity, op.option_pk, op.option_name, eos.eos_deliv_seq FROM orders od INNER JOIN store_section ss ON ss.ss_pk = od.ss_fk INNER JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk INNER JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name INNER JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk INNER JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk INNER JOIN excel_order_seq eos ON op.eo_fk = eos.eos_pk WHERE od.regi_no IS NOT NULL AND od.or_serial_special_number = #{searchKeyword} AND od.or_cancled_flag = 0 AND od.or_excel_div_flag = 0 AND od.or_refunds = 0 GROUP BY od.or_pk, od.or_serial_special_number, ss.ss_name, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_buyer_another_name, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_buyer_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number2, od.or_shipping_address, od.or_shipping_address_detail, od.or_shipping_address_number, od.or_product_order_number, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, od.or_amount, od.or_product_price, od.or_total_price, od.or_discount_price, od.or_product_fk, od.or_order_number, od.or_delivery_invoice_number, od.or_request, od.req_no, od.res_no, od.regi_no, od.regi_po_nm, od.res_date, od.price, od.v_tel_no, od.arr_cnpo_nm, od.deliv_po_nm, od.deliv_area_cd, od.or_rec_type, od.or_rec_memo, od.or_rec_storage_place, pm.pm_pk, om.om_pk, pro.product_pk, pro.cf_fk, pro.product_flag, om.om_store_option_name, om.om_option_amount, op.option_pk, op.option_name, eos.eos_deliv_seq ) INNE GROUP BY eos_deliv_seq, INNE.or_pk, INNE.or_serial_special_number, INNE.ss_name, INNE.or_buyer_name, INNE.or_buyer_another_name, INNE.or_receiver_name, INNE.or_shipping_address_number, INNE.or_shipping_address, INNE.or_shipping_address_detail, INNE.or_receiver_contract_number1, INNE.or_receiver_contract_number2, INNE.or_delivery_invoice_number, INNE.req_no, INNE.res_no, INNE.regi_no, INNE.regi_po_nm, INNE.res_date, INNE.price, INNE.v_tel_no, INNE.arr_cnpo_nm, INNE.deliv_po_nm, INNE.deliv_area_cd, INNE.or_rec_type, INNE.or_rec_memo, INNE.or_rec_storage_place, INNE.product_name, INNE.option_pk, INNE.option_name ORDER BY eos_deliv_seq ASC, INNE.product_name DESC, INNE.option_name DESC

SELECT or_buyer_name, or_receiver_name, or_shipping_address, or_shipping_address_detail, or_delivery_invoice_number FROM orders WHERE or_sending_deadline = #{dateStart} AND or_cancled_flag = 0 AND or_refunds = 0 GROUP BY or_buyer_name, or_receiver_name, or_shipping_address, or_shipping_address_detail, or_delivery_invoice_number

SELECT INNE.or_serial_special_number, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(INNE.or_sending_deadline, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AS or_sending_deadline, INNE.or_buyer_name, INNE.or_receiver_name, INNE.or_shipping_address_number, INNE.or_shipping_address, INNE.or_shipping_address_detail, INNE.or_receiver_contract_number2, INNE.or_receiver_contract_number1, INNE.or_delivery_message, INNE.or_pk, INNE.or_user_column1, INNE.or_user_column4 AS or_deliv_enter, CONCAT(INNE.product_name, ' ', INNE.option_name) AS or_product, SUM(totalQuantity) AS or_amount, INNE.or_buyer_contract_number1, INNE.pm_pk, INNE.product_pk, INNE.om_pk, INNE.option_pk FROM(
SELECT od.or_pk, od.or_serial_special_number, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_buyer_another_name, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_buyer_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number2, od.or_shipping_address, od.or_shipping_address_detail, od.or_shipping_address_number, od.or_sending_deadline, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, od.or_amount, od.or_product_fk, GROUP_CONCAT(od.or_delivery_message separator ',') AS or_delivery_message, od.or_user_column1, od.or_user_column4, pm.pm_pk, pro.product_pk, pro.product_name, pro.cf_fk, pro.product_flag, om.om_pk, om.om_store_option_name, SUM(od.or_amount * om.om_option_amount) as totalQuantity, op.option_pk, op.option_name FROM orders od INNER JOIN store_section ss ON ss.ss_pk = od.ss_fk INNER JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk INNER JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name INNER JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk INNER JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk WHERE od.regi_no IS NULL AND od.or_excel_div_flag = 0 AND od.or_cancled_flag = 0 AND od.or_refunds = 0 AND od.or_serial_special_number = #{searchKeyword} GROUP BY od.or_pk, od.or_serial_special_number, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_buyer_another_name, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_buyer_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number2, od.or_shipping_address, od.or_shipping_address_detail, od.or_shipping_address_number, od.or_sending_deadline, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, od.or_amount, od.or_product_fk, od.or_user_column1, od.or_user_column4, pm.pm_pk, om.om_pk, pro.product_pk, pro.cf_fk, pro.product_flag, om.om_store_option_name, om.om_option_amount, op.option_pk, op.option_name ORDER BY od.or_pk ) INNE GROUP BY INNE.or_pk, INNE.or_serial_special_number, or_sending_deadline, INNE.or_buyer_name, INNE.or_receiver_name, INNE.or_shipping_address_number, INNE.or_shipping_address, INNE.or_shipping_address_detail, INNE.or_receiver_contract_number2, INNE.or_receiver_contract_number1, INNE.or_delivery_message, INNE.or_user_column1, or_deliv_enter, INNE.or_buyer_contract_number1, INNE.pm_pk, INNE.product_pk, INNE.om_pk, INNE.option_pk ORDER BY INNE.or_serial_special_number ASC, or_deliv_enter DESC, INNE.product_name DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE orders SET or_delivery_company = '프레시솔루션', or_delivery_invoice_number = '입력전', regi_no = '입력전', edt_fk = 3
WHERE or_pk = #{orPk}
UPDATE orders SET or_delivery_invoice_number = #{orDeliveryInvoiceNumber}, regi_no = #{orDeliveryInvoiceNumber} WHERE or_pk = #{orPk}

UPDATE orders SET or_delivery_invoice_number = null, req_no = null, res_no = null, regi_no = null, regi_po_nm = null, res_date = null, price = null, v_tel_no = null, arr_cnpo_nm = null, deliv_po_nm = null, deliv_area_cd = null, or_invoice_num_date = null, or_delivery_company = null, or_deliv_count = null, edt_fk = 0 WHERE or_pk = #{orPk}
